data.title: International Design competition
data.meta_description: [phase eins]. hossbach & lehmhaus. You seek for your real-estate project: Optimum decision-making, Economic efficiency, Speed-up of the authorization procedure,  Functionality, Competent Partners, 	Architectural excellence. We provide: Project consultancy from your first draft up to the completion of the plans and documents required for obtaining the building permit,  planning of required spaces, feasibility studies, marketing concepts, administration management, public relations, competition management. [phase eins]. is a team of architects and other professionals specialized in project consultancy in the fields of architecture and urban planning. Due to our qualification and experience, we can provide sponsors with expert advice during the initial project stages and act as mediators between sponsors, local government and architects. Our profile covers the performance of all steps required for the preparation of project fundamentals, the fine-tuning of project design and the selection of the optimum partner for the subsequent stages of planning. In the past years we have been successfully consulting clients all over central Europe, amongst them the adidas-Salomon AG (Global Headquarters at the Herzo Base, Herzogenaurach), the BMW Group (BMW Welt Munich, BMW Plant Leipzig, BMW Tower Munich) die ETH Zurich (ETH World) and the state of Hesse (Hessian Diet in Wiesbaden, Permanent representation of the State of Hesse in Berlin, Biomedical Research Centre in Giessen, Campus Westend and Bockenheim site of Johann Wolfgang Goethe-University).
